document.description: Slate magazine article: Entrepreneur as Madonna
document.name: EntrepreneurAsMadonna

sentence.text: I 'm not given to making guesses . "
I invite guesses . "
If any child makes wild random guesses note quietly who it is : those pupils will need your attention .
He made a guess .
Fortunetellers make educated guesses too -- mostly about what they think their ` subject " would like to hear .
Hence if you were to take a guess at selecting a high-fibre vegetable you might well think of something like celery , which seems to reveal its fibre content unmistakably .
So , I will hazard my guess .
What ' s your guess ?
My guess however is that the Ariston 's unusually musical qualities will appeal in the long term where some more glamorous looking contrivances will ultimately be found tiresome or wanting .
If the case had gone to court , it 's anyone 's guess what would have happened .
My guess is that he wished women back in their twentieth-century slot .
But I was real familiar with his records and so I knew it was gonna be that way ; in fact it was really kinda fun to have to take a guess at when he was gonna change .
What the connection is we can only hazard a guess at but it confirms all our worst suspicions about anything-core outfits once and for all .
The basic answer lies in the guesses about future cash flow .
People may vote with one hand on their wallets , but their guesses about future prosperity are tangled up with judgments of the competing politicians .
It appeared that my guess about the tide had been near enough .
So let me begin by making some impressionistic guesses about the views women do in fact currently hold on morality .
The law requires the chief of police to make educated guesses about the likelihood that disorder , damage or disruption will occur .
` Can you make any guesses about who might have done this ? " asked Jean .
No one at this stage is prepared to hazard a guess at the outcome of the poll on February 25 .
In Romanian , Serbo-Croat or Czech , I can make a guess at meanings based on my bits and pieces of Italian , Latin , German or Russian .
When she does n't know who the culprit is , she makes a guess at it , and the trouble is she 's often right .
Now if you look at the first four figures there , does anybody want to have a guess at what those first four figures mean ?
` Would you care to hazard a guess at the contents ? "
Our spies think the best guess for general availability of Solaris-on-iAPX-86 is May .
April is the best guess for first deliveries .
Ca n't tell you precisely what weapon , but my guess of a piece of lead piping wrapped in a sock is as good as any .
Had that guess of 3% proved right , GDP should comfortably have expanded by the same amount .
In practice it may be possible to make an enlightened guess as to the origin and type of infection involved , but in very few cases can the physician be one hundred per cent sure of his diagnosis .
Kircher 's guess as to the continent 's position was based on Plato 's version .
Even if the child 's articulation is poor , the adult is likely to be able to make a good guess as to a likely meaning .
Many independent forecasters have recently raised their guesses on growth in 1993 to around 1.5% .
What ' s your guess on the invasion of France ?
One can reconstruct the original language by looking for common words and then make a guess about where the language came from .
I mean we can say what it 's made of and we might be able to make a guess at how old it is .
Stifling a giggle , she hazarded a guess that the wardrobe would be full of the son 's clothes .
Since further complaints against him would almost certainly have been recorded , it is a fair guess that he took to the open life .
It ' s my guess that the statuette was then replaced , and was obscured from his line of vision by the banner this morning . "
It is a safe guess that no Indian thought of writing a play about the equally dramatic course of events that put Charles II on his throne .
` It ' s my guess that the reunion really will take place -- probably only a few minutes after her arrival . "
It ' s my guess that you had an affair in Australia , and that 's what kept you so long . "
As for me , I 'll stick with my philosophy of reporting and , I guess , life -- nobody knows .

It 's anyone 's guess what may happen in the future , but for now Hong Kong bristles with energy and ambition , and for the visitor , this beautiful city with its contrasts and variety is an exhilarating experience .
